=A7Prometheus=A7    =A7Epimetheus=A7

   Out from the remains of the Space =
Shuttle one of the bots stands 
up.  This bot is Blue.  He quickly looks ar=
ound and notices that some 
bots standing around surveying the damage.  He =
quickly pulls out a 
Plasma Pistol and aims it at the closest bot.  He slow=
ly pulls the 
trigger and a plasma Pistol is shot.  But it wasn't Blue's Pl=
asma 
Pistol because Blue was the one that was shot.  Blue fell to the 
gro=
und grasping his back where smoke was rising.  Smoke was also 
rising from =
a plasma pistol.  It was Red's Pistol.  Red put his 
pistol away and looked=
 around

    "Stupid Epimetheus,"  Red said as he turns to address the bots=
 
around them, "I am Prometheus, who are you?"
